Job Description: Your Key Responsibilities    Work with a team of product manager, architects, developers, and testers to deliver the products at a lightning pace in the cutting edge microservices architecture and technologies   Participate in all aspects of Scrum and work with multiple teams to plan, test and deliver potential shippable product at the end of each sprint   Take ownership of end-to-end software development for the platform for the pieces assigned to you   Work closely with QA and product teams to ensure quality and timely deliverables   Ability to summarize issues and resolutions from the customers perspective   Participate in Agile development, daily scrum, and sprints    Your Profile    3 - 8 years of experience in software development, design, architecture, and implementation in responsive design   Strong experience in Angular   Strong experience in TDD / Unit Testing / Jasmine / Karma   Strong experience in ES6 and WebPack   Strong experience in LESS / CSS3 / SASS   Experience with AmCharts, and other graphing technologies   Experience with Websockets and real-time communication   Good knowledge of backend technologies and API?s   Hands on ability, creativity, and commercial acumen   Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills
